text: @NYGovCuomo Anybody who goes into the hospital &Has to stay over they make you get tested for the coronavirus but there’s more germs in the hospital anywhere else but I’m lucky that my primary Also does the testing & I have an appoint on the 18th  🙏 that the next test comes out neg as well
